column4: Does anybody know where I can find information on getting the Realtek Audio working in Ubuntu
I've tried everything it looks like the card is there but no sound from the speakers
Card When I run alsamixer I get Card HDA Intel, Chip Realtek ID 268 and both Master and PCM 100<>100
Neverblue that is what I get when running alsamixer
do you see 82801H anywhere for your intel sound card?
